name: He Who Is Owned Only by the Land

chapters.title: Chapter 22: The Wyld
chapters.info: He Who Is Owned Only by the Land, p. 416—Sharan pseudonym for Bao the Wyld, the Dragonslayer. Editor's note: it is unclear whether Bao the Wyld was intended to be the Dragonslayer, or simply the Dragon. It would be just like Demandred to twist the prophecy to fit his aims. See Bao the Wyld.
